fields.inlineHelpText: The type of CAPA which can be Customer, Internal, or Supplier (SCAR).
fields.label: CAPA Type
fields.name: compliancequest__CAPA_Type__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Additional information relating to the closure of the CAPA.
fields.label: Comments
fields.name: compliancequest__Closure_Comment__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Date the record was closed.
fields.label: Completed On
fields.name: compliancequest__Complete_Date__c

fields.inlineHelpText: User that completed the record.
fields.label: Completed By
fields.name: compliancequest__Completed_By__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Date the containment was completed.
fields.label: Containment Completion Date
fields.name: compliancequest__Completion_Date_Containment__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Date the investigation was completed.
fields.label: Investigation Completion Date
fields.name: compliancequest__Completion_Date_Investigation__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Date the response was completed.
fields.label: Acknowledgment Completion Date
fields.name: compliancequest__Completion_Date_Response__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Indicates if immediate containment actions are required.  When checked, at least one containment action must be added to the response.
fields.label: Containment Required?
fields.name: compliancequest__Containment_Required__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Indicates if the CAPA is a result of a nonconformity.
fields.label: Corrective Action Required?
fields.name: compliancequest__Corrective_Action_Required__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Detailed description of the problem that the CAPA will address.
fields.label: Description
fields.name: compliancequest__Description__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Date the containment action(s) are due.
fields.label: Containment Due Date
fields.name: compliancequest__Due_Date_Containment__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Date the investigation is due.
fields.label: Investigation Due Date
fields.name: compliancequest__Due_Date_Investigation__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Date a response must be submitted by.
fields.label: Acknowledgment Due Date
fields.name: compliancequest__Due_Date_Response__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Indicates if approval of the verification of effectiveness for the CAPA is required.
fields.label: Effectiveness Approval Required?
fields.name: compliancequest__Effectiveness_Approval_Required__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Period of time to elapse before the verification of effectiveness for the CAPA is performed.
fields.label: Days to Monitor
fields.name: compliancequest__Effectiveness_Monitoring_Days__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Description detailing how the effectiveness of the CAPA will be verified.
fields.label: Effectiveness Verification Plan
fields.name: compliancequest__Effectiveness_Verification_Plan__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Indicates if an emergency response is required.
fields.label: Emergency Response Required?
fields.name: compliancequest__Emergency_Response_Required__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Describe the emergency response based on the situation.
fields.label: Emergency Response
fields.name: compliancequest__Emergency_Response__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Date by which all open implementations are expected to be completed.
fields.label: Expected Completion Date
fields.name: compliancequest__Expected_Completion_Date__c

fields.inlineHelpText: External reference number if there is an artifact created from a 3rd party (supplier, customer, auditor, etc.).  If the CAPA was created from a Nonconformance, the record number will be populated.
fields.label: External Reference Number
fields.name: compliancequest__External_Reference_Number__c

fields.inlineHelpText: This is checkbox field used to know if approval pending corrective actions in capa
fields.label: Has In Approval Corrective Actions
fields.name: compliancequest__Has_In_Approval_Corrective_Actions__c

fields.inlineHelpText: This is checkbox field used to know if approval pending preventive actions in capa
fields.label: Has In Approval Preventive Actions
fields.name: compliancequest__Has_In_Approval_Preventive_Actions__c

fields.inlineHelpText: This is checkbox field used to know if open containment exists in capa
fields.label: Has Open  Containment
fields.name: compliancequest__Has_Open_Containment__c

fields.inlineHelpText: This is checkbox field used to know if open corrective actions exists in capa
fields.label: Has Open Corrective Actions
fields.name: compliancequest__Has_Open_Corrective_Actions__c

fields.inlineHelpText: This is checkbox field used to know if open preventive actions exists in capa
fields.label: Has Open Preventive Actions
fields.name: compliancequest__Has_Open_Preventive_Actions__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Indicates if an approval is required for the investigation.
fields.label: Investigation Approval Required?
fields.name: compliancequest__Investigation_Approval__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Indicates if an investigation is required. When checked, an investigation must be performed in order to close the CAPA.
fields.label: Investigation Required?
fields.name: compliancequest__Investigation_Required__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Date that the CAPA was issued.
fields.label: Issued Date
fields.name: compliancequest__Issued_Date__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Indicates if a verification of effectiveness check for the CAPA is required.
fields.label: Effectiveness Review Required?
fields.name: compliancequest__Needs_Effectiveness_Review__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Description of the operation.
fields.label: Operation
fields.name: compliancequest__Operation__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The business unit that is responsible for the CAPA.
fields.label: Org. Business Unit
fields.name: compliancequest__Org_Business_Unit__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The division that is responsible for the CAPA.
fields.label: Org. Division
fields.name: compliancequest__Org_Division__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The region that is responsible for the CAPA.
fields.label: Org. Region
fields.name: compliancequest__Org_Region__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The site that is responsible for the CAPA.
fields.label: Org. Site
fields.name: compliancequest__Org_Site__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Indicates if an approval is required for the implementation
fields.label: Implementation Approval Required?
fields.name: compliancequest__Post_Approval_Required__c

fields.inlineHelpText: If the action plan is changed after it is approved, another approval will be required prior to completion of the action plans.
fields.label: Change Requires Approval?
fields.name: compliancequest__Pre_Approval_Required__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Indicates if the CAPA is a result of a continuous improvement.
fields.label: Preventive Action Required?
fields.name: compliancequest__Preventive_Action_Required__c

fields.inlineHelpText: A rating that indicates how well the 8D was executed and its ability to prevent recurrence of the original problem.
fields.label: 8D Rating
fields.name: compliancequest__Rating_8D__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Rating for how effective the CAPA is.  A 5 star rating represents a very effective CAPA and a 0 star rating very ineffective CAPA.
fields.label: Rating
fields.name: compliancequest__Rating__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Description of the recommended action(s) that should be part of the CAPA action plan to address the root causes of the nonconformity.
fields.label: Recommended Action
fields.name: compliancequest__Recommended_Action__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Description of how the problem has been resolved by the CAPA.
fields.label: Resolution
fields.name: compliancequest__Resolution__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether a response is required. When required, the Acknowledgment Completion date is populated based on the date the first response is submitted.
fields.label: Acknowledgment Required?
fields.name: compliancequest__Response_Required__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Revision number of the CAPA.
fields.label: Revision
fields.name: compliancequest__Revision__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The supplier or customer relating to the CAPA.
fields.label: Account
fields.name: compliancequest__SQX_Account__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The user that will perform the implementation approval.
fields.label: Implementation Approver
fields.name: compliancequest__SQX_Action_Approver__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Approval matrix that contains the approval steps to be used for the CAPA
fields.label: Approval Matrix
fields.name: compliancequest__SQX_Approval_Matrix__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The coordinator for the CAPA to help facilitate the investigation and other activities.
fields.label: CAPA Coordinator
fields.name: compliancequest__SQX_CAPA_Coordinator__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The sponsor for the CAPA.  This may also be the process owner.
fields.label: CAPA Sponsor
fields.name: compliancequest__SQX_CAPA_Sponsor__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Acknowledge the contributions from the team to address the CAPA and describe the positives, negatives, and any opportunities for improvement to consider for the next CAPA.
fields.label: Comments
fields.name: compliancequest__SQX_D8_Comments__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The department responsible for the CAPA.
fields.label: Department
fields.name: compliancequest__SQX_Department__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The user that will perform the verification of effectiveness for the CAPA.
fields.label: Effectiveness Reviewer
fields.name: compliancequest__SQX_Effectiveness_Reviewer__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The contact from the supplier or customer that will be involved with the CAPA.
fields.label: External Contact
fields.name: compliancequest__SQX_External_Contact__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The user that will perform the investigation approval.
fields.label: Investigation Approver
fields.name: compliancequest__SQX_Investigation_Approver__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The nonconforming product that the CAPA will address.
fields.label: Product
fields.name: compliancequest__SQX_Part__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The previous version of the CAPA.
fields.label: Revised CAPA
fields.name: compliancequest__SQX_Revised_CAPA__c

fields.inlineHelpText: References the original CAPA record when a new revision is required as a result of an effectivenes review.
fields.label: Revision Of CAPA
fields.name: compliancequest__SQX_Revision_Of_CAPA__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The nonconforming Process that the CAPA will address.
fields.label: Process
fields.name: compliancequest__SQX_Service__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Date the CAPA is due.
fields.label: Target Due Date
fields.name: compliancequest__Target_Due_Date__c

fields.inlineHelpText: A simple headline summary for the CAPA.
fields.label: Title
fields.name: compliancequest__Title__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Total number of Unapproved Effectiveness review
fields.label: Total No. Of Unapproved Eff Review
fields.name: compliancequest__Total_No_Of_Unapproved_Eff_Review__c
